name: UpKill
description:
UpKill is a fast paced, wave based, arena, zombie, platform shooter. 

The goal is to kill as many zombies as you can and progress through the waves, but be warned, the further you go, the more dangerous zombies you will encounter!

Need a helping hand? Stop by the vending machine and for the cheap price of 20 coins pick yourself up a random weapon to aid in your zombie killing fun.

How far did you get? Let me know in the comments below!

UpKill is my first uploaded game so I am releasing it fairly early on in the development process to get some feedback as I continue working on it.

Status:
Early Development - Full Release late 2021

Controls:
Left/Right Arrow: Move
Up Arrow: Jump
Down Arrow: Interact
Space: Shoot
F11: Toggle Fullscreen Mode
